title: When Giants Collide! Top two teams in the ABL Season 7 are facing off RIGHT NOW!
body:
Dynasty eSports is the team to beat right now, they are coming off super hot from last week when they were able to break Recon 5's win streak! This match is a must not miss for sure!

Over on ablstream2 we have a bit of delay but you guys can check it out over on Recon 5's stream until Game 2 when we will be live on ablstream2 on Twitch

Learn more @https://ablseries.com

Official ABL Series Discord - https://discord.gg/hK6pezj

Tonight's Schedule:
ABL 1 - 8:00 PM EST
Dynasty eSports vs First Blood Marauders
PBP - MilkyCereal
Color - Koiyaki
Stream - nickncs | Head Producer

ABL 2 - 8:00 PM EST
No Fear eSports vs Recon 5
PBP - Zzzzfb | PBP Caster
Color - Rebel Fox
Stream - ArkWulff | Streamer
